EmailTemplate.name: Authentic.Send Email 3.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: New Article: The End of the Payment Card?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Platforming for a Digital First World GAIN THE AGILITY YOU NEED TO OWN THE FUTURE ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Debit and credit cards used to dominate everyday transactions.
But then the crisis happened—bringing with it the need for new (often contactless) ways of transacting and moving money.
The payments industry was already undergoing a seismic shift, from EMV to biometrics to payments popping up in unexpected places, like smart speakers.
See what else is shaking up the industry and what it takes to respond in our new article. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
